I am hardworking and always learning new language concepts and practices.     I have also developed add-ons for popular video games using LUA. I also pick up lesser known languages fairly quickly. I have utilized different functions and languages in the projects on my github.. They range from simple projects to relatively neat and complex ones.

work.title: Embroiderer/Technician
work.description: Using a CAD-like program ( Design Shop Pro), I designed files for customers, maintained computer environments and troubleshooted various issues. Fixed and maintained large mass production embroidery machines. Tech Support for the business software itself and multiple computers running windows. Managed a design file server to host the files on and pull to the machines themselves. Converted art into stitches by vectorizing and digitizing the source into a compatible format for the machines.
